text: @NYGovCuomo It’s your fault! Actually, you & @NYCMayor for letting days upon days of protestors on streets during #coronavirus You two guys are to be blame! Also, we all know this is just a way to inject fear to masses for the upcoming the rallies of President @realDonaldTrump .
